title: Racer Watch Face
summary: This Racer Watch Face is a seamless interactive watch face.
description: This Racer Watch Face uses an elegant combo of colors. Watch face gives a very futuristic interaction of the watch. It works well in ambient mode too. Great graphics makes it look much better in the dark. Many more different options will be coming up too.  Specific Android Wear options✔ Choose the background color of watch face✔ Choose the arc colors ✔ Choose date and time colors ✔ Choose divider line color ✔ Interactive watch face Configuration:    ✔ Choose colors    ✔ Capability to choose 12 Hour watch face.Installation/Common Synchronization problem & Solution:: If the Application does not appear on your watch please do the following:- uninstall the face- disconnect watch from phone- restart watch- connect watch and phone again- install Racer Watch Face once againAndroid Wear App takes some time to sync all watch faces.Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R,Moto360 2 watch, Sony smartwatches...In case of any problems, instead please contact us on: koherent.apps@gmail.comGive us maximum 24 hours to solve your problem and be a completely satisfied user of your newly acquired app.
descriptionHTML:
This Racer Watch Face uses an elegant combo of colors. Watch face gives a very futuristic interaction of the watch. It works well in ambient mode too. Great graphics makes it look much better in the dark. Many more different options will be coming up too.

Specific Android Wear options
✔ Choose the background color of watch face
✔ Choose the arc colors
✔ Choose date and time colors
✔ Choose divider line color
✔ Interactive watch face

Configuration:
✔ Choose colors
✔ Capability to choose 12 Hour watch face.

Installation/Common Synchronization problem & Solution::
If the Application does not appear on your watch please do the following:
- uninstall the face
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart watch
- connect watch and phone again
- install Racer Watch Face once again

Android Wear App takes some time to sync all watch faces.

Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R,Moto360 2 watch, Sony smartwatches...
In case of any problems, instead please contact us on: koherent.apps@gmail.com
Give us maximum 24 hours to solve your problem and be a completely satisfied user of your newly acquired app.
comments: Companion app? Good, but I never received a companion app neither on the watch or my phone to change the colors which means it's just a white ring around the edges, which isn't what you'd expect from a paid watch face...
recentChanges: New Watch Face packaged with Companion App to easily customize watch face. Change all the colors of your watch face. Use the colors and share with people.
